metadata.description: Background scene prompts for cultivation novel '天魔系统', featuring various locations from humble sect to grand gatherings, all in Chinese xianxia style without people or text
metadata.prompt_style: Chinese xianxia cultivation style, detailed visual descriptions, 8k resolution quality
metadata.usage_guideline: All prompts specify 'no people, no text, no UI elements' to ensure clean background images suitable for composition with characters later
metadata.optimization_notes: Added complete Chinese prompt translations (main_prompt_cn and prompt_cn) for all scenes. Enhanced sub-scenes with comprehensive coverage including different times, weather conditions, and angles. All prompts comply with xianxia style guidelines and include quality modifiers.
